key.name: switched-layout
key.description: Specifies, whether the editor should be in the left and the shader area in the right or the other way around

key.name: auto-compile
key.description: Specifies, whether the current shader source should automatically be compiled every few seconds

key.name: tiling
key.description: Specifies whether the shadertoy area should be divided in tiles for rendering to prevent GPU overload

key.name: adaptive-tiling
key.description: The size of the rendering tiles is set automatically to keep the GUI responsive

key.name: num-tilings
key.description: Number of tiles in x and y direction

key.name: virtual-resolution
key.description: When enabled, the shadertoy area is rendered with higher or lower resolution for higher quality or better performance

key.name: virtual-resolution-factor
key.description: Specifies how much the render-resolution should differ from the native resolution

key.name: glsl-version
key.description: Specifies the GLSL Version used to render the shader

key.name: backporting
key.description: Specifies which built-in functions from GLSL Version 1.30 should be backported
